page.title: 15Social concerns -Brafferton
page.content:
The major issue which has provoked action from the people in the area is over the{dangerous state of the A167 road since a serious accident took place at the turn-off for Brafferton. Local people have been agitating for changes to make the road safer because the road junction lies just below the crest of a hill and the fast moving traffic makes it difficult to cross safely.
An{inspector}did visit the site and recommended levelling the hill but as thus would have meant the demolition of some cottages it was not regarded as practicable or acceptable.
Traffic bollards have been installed tnd improved the position but the issue remains a grievance.
